rationale: The segment contains advice/safety measures, not an intensifier/comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides factual information about mitigation/safety ('will also kill any viruses') without high-potency framing.
The segment does not contain a question.
Provides safety information (cooking temp) but lacks explicit calming language using the word 'safe'.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with scale contrast for reassurance.
The segment provides cooking advice but contains no bare negation pattern.
States a fact about cooking temperature as a safeguard/mitigation ('Properly cooking poultry and eggs... will also kill any viruses').
